review: I have been a patient of Dr. Mridula Singh since 2019 onwards and visited her clinic several times for root canal, pre and post treatment. As always she was quick to figure out the issue and to take the appropriate measure. Doctor has been very polite, careful towards her patients, she always make sure to take a feedback from the patient to ensure that everything is going fine after the treatment. I would highly recommend her.

Highly recommend! I've visited the doctor for multiple root canals and some surgeries, and so far my experience has been excellent. Dr Mridula is an experienced doctor. She explains the problem well and provides a solution accordingly. I also advise my friends and family to visit her clinic for dental checkups. Summarising it, her service is satisfactory.

reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback.

tags: Value for money,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental Surgery,Re-Root Canal Treatment,Dentures, Crowns and Bridges,
review:
I have multiple dental issues .
1.) I have visited for re-RTC, because earlier RTC was done in native ,which was not proper . So Dr.Mridula,helped me in doing reRCT and reduced that pain . 
Also fixed the new combined crown for all 3 tooth. It has nicely fitted to my rcts tooth.
2.)There was a wisdom tooth which was filled with cavities and hence that needs to be extracted.Mam has done the smooth tooth extraction without any complications and no issues after the surgery .

3.)Later i had the old fillings which was rotten and ,if we leave it ho fo RCT.Mam has done the removal.of cavities with sensitiveness and did the fillings.

Now my all dental issues were sorted by mam with very professional manner and she has good experience in understanding and patience in understanding the patients issues. I went to her with colleagues reference. I really like her treatment and the experience in dealing the dental issues.
reply_text:
Hi roja.
 You are one of our co operative patient who trusted us
 Patiently belived us, that is the reason we delivered our 100%.take care.
Thanks for your review.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Satisfied with the treatment received from Dr Mridula. There was no tendency to overdo procedures - she tried to do minimal intervention and the results have been good.
Very professional doctor and a nice person. She is patient and took time to explain the dental problems I am having.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was pushing my wisdom tooth extraction for a while now. And the pandemic was an even greater excuse to delay the same. But I noticed some decay in one of my wisdom teeth and decided not to wait for it to worsen. The clinic maintained very good hygiene. I was sent in to meet the dentist immediately. She explained the complete process, time taken for the procedure as well as the pricing for the same. I didn't want to come again and requested for the procedure to be done at the earliest. The dentist was very friendly, explained all details every step of the way, and made sure I was completely relaxed. The procedures were done in 2 hours time. Very very happy with the doctor. Will definitely recommend!
reply_text: Thank you soo much Likitha for your valuable feedback. You were very kind on your part and highly co operative and we are happy to have helped you with all the concerns that you had. Take care. Regards!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

All the staff and everyone worked as a team from maintaining sanitisation to conducting the entire treatment. I was so relieved. Kudos to the entire team for helping me in such a situation. review: One of the bad dental experience. Initially I was okay but with time I started facing issue. I went to the local doctor there and she told me that my gums were infected *** *** ******* *** *** **** ******* I would ask you to avoid going to this clinic *** ***** ** * ******** ******* *** *** *********** I got my fillings done again and spent double on getting healed.
reply_text:
Thank you Bhawna for your valuable feedback. We did look through your records in here with us wherein we suggested the respective treatment which was done 2 years back. Whatever treatments conducted also hold account of how efficiently you maintain the same. Complains of gum issues probably is the compromised maintainance from your part. All the doctors working in here are efficiently qualified and work as a team to deliver the best results to our patients. It has also been noted that you haven't turned up for our follow up visits which we recommend. You also booked for appointments yourself and didn't turn up. Failing to comply to the same you thereby left town without a notice. As per the capital is concerned it is a fact that the expenses abroad are way more than the scenario in India. However it was unfortunate you faced the same. Take care.

Regards,
Avishi dental clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I got my orthodontic treatment from this clinic, which started one year back. I have to say I am disappointed with the treatment. ** ***** ****** **** ****** ******* *** *** **** *** *** ** *** ** **** ***** *** I am starting the re-treatment from elsewhere now!
Firstly I felt the doctor did not explain at all what changes my teeth would go through and my teeth are pushed inside ******* ** ************* ***** * **** ********* * ****** ******** ***** *** ******** *********** ** *** *** ************* ***** *********** **** ******** *** ********** ** ****** **** ***** *** ***** *** ***** **** ** ** * ****** ********* So, 
I have wasted 12 months here plus 2 teeth extractions ***** **** ************ ******** **** *** ***** ****** * **** ********** ******** ****** ***** **** **** no care for the patient *** ** ****** ******* ****** *** ***** *******
reply_text: Its unfortunate that you ended up with this viewpoint and disappointing of this uncertain behaviour. Orthodontic treatments span across a certain amount of time and you always wanted to rush with the treatment. This was the same when we initiated the treatment for you and within a mere span of 2 months you were miraculously expecting results and without even raising a concern with us you ended up putting a negative review. Post this we made you understand the entire procedure to which you complied and you yourself took the review down. Due to the current situation we could not schedule cases that is not an emergency but we made sure to keep following up with our patients. But you were impatient even after the specialist recommending for the treatment to go along for some more months. You willingly took initiative to cessate the treatment gleefully saying that you were happy with the treatment done. We prioritize on making treatments as conservative as possible thereby retaining natural teeth. Your profile was impossible to be corrected without extractions. You yourself can compare your profiles now to how drastic the change has been. Atleast you could have raised a concern with us instead of happily going and repeating the same behaviour. Regards.

review: Highly disappointed with the lack of Hygiene during these times of Covid pandemic. Recently visited the clinic as my 4.5 years old son's tooth was hurt. Later she and her colleague weren't wearing masks. This was least expected from the Doctors.

I suggest to check with other doctors
I am not satisfied with this 
So i am gonna check with other doctors as well. 
Heavy charges
reply_text: Thank you Sai Ganesh for your valuable feedback. As a dentist it is our duty to explain and educate you with all the concerns in your oral cavity along with your chief complaint. Therefore, the consultation was regarding the same. Hereafter the decision is solely yours on what treatment you would like to proceed with. We never force any treatment on any patients but yes we do educate them. Owing to the current situation we are bearing all the expenses of the protective standards that we need to maintain for the sole reason of the safety of our patients. The consultation charges were already known to you when you booked an appointment for yourself and that is all that you have paid. Anyways do let us know if there is anything we can help you with. Regards!
